title: Blood: The Last Vampire (2002)
original_name: ブラッド ザ・ラストヴァンパイア 2000
sinopse: In 2000, 39 years after the events of the movie, Saya hunts another den of Chiropterans, but the one in charge of the Chiropterans appears to be Saya's twin. Meanwhile, more is learned of Saya's relationship with the US Government, her origin and that of the US Government.
